result.eng: Excuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thú
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal an ón chlochaois thúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal an ón ċloċaois ṫúExcuse me, are you from the stone age?

result.eng: I would like to apologize to you.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom leithscéal a ghabháil leat
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom leithscéal a ghabháil leat
result.html: Ba mhaith liom leithscéal a ghabháil leatI would like to apologize to you.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom leiṫscéal a ġaḃáil leatI would like to apologize to you.

result.eng: Excuse me!
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéalExcuse me!
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéalExcuse me!

result.eng: Excuse me, sir.
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasal
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasal
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal a dhuine uasalExcuse me, sir.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal a ḋuine uasalExcuse me, sir.

result.eng: Excuse me? What do you mean?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal Cad atá i gceist agat
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal Cad atá i gceist agat
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal Cad atá i gceist agatExcuse me? What do you mean?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal Cad atá i gceist agatExcuse me? What do you mean?

result.eng: He was arrested.
result.ga: Gabhadh é
result.orig: Gabhadh é
result.html: Gabhadh éHe was arrested.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃaḋ éHe was arrested.

result.eng: I beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.
result.ga: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-Ghaeilge
result.orig: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-Ghaeilge
result.html: Gabhaim pardún agat as mo chuid droch-GhaeilgeI beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃaim pardún agat as mo ċuid droċ-ĠaeilgeI beg your pardon for my atrocious Irish.

result.eng: The owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ga: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.orig: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoirí
result.html: Ghabh an t-úinéir buíochas lena fhoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ an t-úinéir buíoċas lena ḟoireann féin agus leis na cuairteoiríThe owner tendered thanks to his team and to the visitors.

result.eng: The police arrested me.
result.ga: Ghabh na póilíní mé
result.orig: Ghabh na póilíní mé
result.html: Ghabh na póilíní méThe police arrested me.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ na póilíní méThe police arrested me.

result.eng: An accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ga: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.orig: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.html: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ timpiste dúinn ar an ḃealaċ go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.

result.eng: The article comes with a glossary.
result.ga: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.orig: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an alt
result.html: Tá gluais ag gabháil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.
result.ponchtml: Tá gluais ag gaḃáil leis an altThe article comes with a glossary.

result.eng: I will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.orig: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéal
result.html: Feicfidh mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gabh mo leithscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé céard atá ag tarlú ansin gaḃ mo leiṫscéalI will see what is happening there, excuse me.

result.eng: Excuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoil
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do thoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal An féidir leat é sin a rá aríst le do ṫoilExcuse me. Can you say that again, please?

result.eng: Come here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ga: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.orig: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat
result.html: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uait Isteaċ an ċisteanaċ leatCome here! Into the kitchen with you!

result.eng: Come here.
result.ga: Gabh i leith uait
result.orig: Gabh i leith uait
result.html: Gabh i leith uaitCome here.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ i leiṫ uaitCome here.

result.eng: Excuse me. What time is it?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal Cén t-am atá sé
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal Cén t-am atá sé
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal Cén t-am atá séExcuse me. What time is it?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal Cén t-am atá séExcuse me. What time is it?

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ siad buíoċas le Dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: He was arrested with a gun in his possession.
result.ga: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aige
result.orig: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aige
result.html: Gabhadh é agus gunna ina sheilbh aigeHe was arrested with a gun in his possession.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃaḋ é agus gunna ina ẛeilḃ aigeHe was arrested with a gun in his possession.

result.eng: Come on in. Sit down.
result.ga: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuí
result.orig: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuí
result.html: Gabh ar d'aghaidh Bí i do shuíCome on in. Sit down.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ ar d'aġaiḋ Bí i do ẛuíCome on in. Sit down.

result.eng: Come here and take a look at her.
result.ga: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.orig: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú í
result.html: Gabh anseo go bhfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ anseo go ḃfeice tú íCome here and take a look at her.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.

result.eng: It was getting dark.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas
result.orig: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas
result.html: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholasIt was getting dark.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag gaḃáil ó ẛolasIt was getting dark.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: The streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ga: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.orig: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil as
result.html: Bhí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gabháil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na sráideanna ag bánú agus na solais ag gaḃáil asThe streets we emptying and the lights were going out.

result.eng: He could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ga: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.orig: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmha
result.html: Ní thiocfadh leis a ghabháil chun an bhaile ar phócaí folmhaHe could not come home with empty pockets.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫiocfaḋ leis a ġaḃáil ċun an ḃaile ar ṗócaí folṁaHe could not come home with empty pockets.

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
result.ga: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.orig: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dó
result.html: Tamall beag i ndiaidh a ghabháil ó sholas dóA little while after it got dark...
result.ponchtml: Tamall beag i ndiaiḋ a ġaḃáil ó ẛolas dóA little while after it got dark...

result.eng: It was getting dark.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas de
result.orig: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas de
result.html: Bhí sé ag gabháil ó sholas deIt was getting dark.
